tool_description: Calculates optimal transmit power levels for cellular sites to achieve coverage targets while minimizing interference and power consumption.

site_ids.description: Sites to calculate power levels for

signal_threshold_dbm.description: Minimum signal level at coverage edge in dBm

error_messages: Invalid coverage target: Coverage radius must be between 0.1-50 km.
Signal threshold out of range: Threshold must be between -120 and -60 dBm.
Invalid frequency: Frequency must be within cellular bands (400-6000 MHz).
Site data incomplete: Some sites lack required antenna or location information.
usage: Specify sites and coverage requirements to calculate minimum power levels needed for target coverage areas.

power_levels_dbm.description: Calculated transmit power for each site in dBm

actual_coverage_km.description: Predicted coverage radius per site in kilometers
